amendment.description: To clarify and recommend changes to the policy of the United States on Iraq and to require reports on certain matters relating to Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2518 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 19. Record Vote Number: 323.

action.text: Amendment SA 2518 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S12668-12669; text: CR S12669) To clarify and recommend changes to the policy of the United States on Iraq and to require reports on certain matters relating to Iraq.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2518 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 19. Record Vote Number: 323.
